articles.title: Jadeja doubtful for West Indies ODIs, Rahul for T20Is | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: While Jadeja has a knee niggle, Rahul has tested COVID-positive
articles.content: Ravindra Jadeja has been ruled out** of the first two ODIs against West Indies starting on Friday (July 22) and KL Rahul is unlikely for the T20I series, to be held later in the Caribbean and the US.… [+2143 chars]
